title: Dinnerbone:一些关于“传送”的消息
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-1-10 13:47 编辑 

第一组对话
Dinnerbone:Soon, you'll be teleporting chickens like a crazybone too.
Sacheverell:Does that make them Chickenbone? :O               (膜拜英语新闻官)
yumenightfire27:Can I teleport other things too? I sense mad pranks in my future...
Dinnerbone:MAD PRANKS

第一组译文
Dinnerbone:很快，你就能像疯狂的Dinnerbone一样传送小鸡了！
Sacheverell:那样不会把它们变成鸡排吗？ :O
yumenightfire27:我也能传送其他东西么……比如说未来的疯狂恶作剧……
Dinnerbone:疯狂恶作剧！




第二组对话
Dinnerbone:Teleporting chickens like some kind of crazybone.
HD_iTotal:Any update for the release of the snapshot?
Dinnerbone:Just that it will be today :)
HD_iTotal:henqidai, good work :)

第二组译文
Dinnerbone:像一些疯狂的骨头传送小鸡。
HD_iTotal:有没有什么关于快照的消息？
Dinnerbone:消息就是今天会发布。:)
HD_iTotal:很期待啊，干得好 :)





Dinnerbone:Relative teleports are so smooth now it's scary. You don't even notice them. I think I overdid it.

Dinnerbone:比较而言，传送是很平和的，但现在变疯狂了。你甚至都没注意到，我觉得我玩脱了。



这些什么乱七八糟的逗比玩意，Dinnerbone你到底是不是认真的。。。传送方块？传送实体的指令？传送门？
